sourcesContent:
{{ episode.name }}

Air Date: {{ episode.air_date }}

Episode: {{ episode.episode }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { RickAndMortyService } from '../../services/rick-and-morty.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-episode-list', templateUrl: './episode-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./episode-list.component.css'] }) export class EpisodeListComponent implements OnInit { episodes: any[] = []; constructor(private rickAndMortyService: RickAndMortyService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.rickAndMortyService.getEpisodes().subscribe((data: any) => { // Fetch episodes and use the first character's image as a representative thumbnail this.episodes = data.results.map((episode: any) => ({ ...episode, image: episode.characters.length > 0 ? episode.characters[0].replace('https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/', 'https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/') + '/avatar.jpg' : 'https://via.placeholder.com/150', // Placeholder if no characters are associated })); }); } }
